title: alpha client item sets
body: I've recently been using the alpha client, and, i am unable to find the section where you can create item sets like in the old client, I've look under collection, and profile. I'm certain I've just missed it, but to be safe I'm posting here hoping someone can help me

replies.body:
Just saw here: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/4ac7a0bc-8847-40cd-8efb-aa5aa3a660f4 that apparently item set creation isn't planned in the new client! That sent me over here to the forums in a hurry. I do use this feature and want either it or a full, well-supported replacement to exist in the new client. Time to up-vote everything related to this and push Riot towards either supporting it long-term or supporting an open-source 3rd party version that will be just as good and just as consistently supported.

Please, Riot?

The item set and changes are super helpful i don't want to be forced to memorize every champs best build or have to write it down you have a nice and convenient set up don't  waste it {{item:3151}} {{item:3151}}

I don't think Item Sets are active on the alpha client yet.  There are features activated as they become ready for testing, so book mark the [Alpha boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work) to stay up to date!  Hope that helps!
